dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: We finally got 1 out 3 missing parts of the ship. Maybe we can find the 2nd one in underwater.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: It is a very high chance that some parts landed deep in the sea.

dialogue.speaker: Zed
dialogue.line: Thanks to your gadgets, going underwater is not a problem. Thank you for this.

dialogue.speaker: Deemo
dialogue.line: You're welcome. Now we should continue our search.
